data.title: MAREI October Meeting: How to Flip 100 Houses a Year in Kansas City with Nathan Brooks
data.meta_description: Lessons and Losses from building an 8- figure real estate investing business Register at http://www.MAREI.
data.text:
Lessons and Losses from building an 8- figure real estate investing business

Register at http://www.MAREI.org

Nathan Brooks local real estate flipper is on target to flip more than100 houses in Kansas City this year. Along the way from beginning his business and growing make over 8 figures, he has learned a thing or two. Join us on Tuesday, October 9th Nathan will open up his playbook to show us the lessons he has learned and losses he has had in his journey.

Find out why you need to start small, with a very clear vision of your target.

Learn how to execute your plan and review your data, and what Nathan jacked up in the process.

When it’s time to scale your business if you want to, and how to do it.

Why giving yourself the title of CEO does not make you a leader.

How to lead, set culture and direction to grow your business.

Nathan is an experienced real estate investor with more than a decade of rehabbing, flipping, buying, selling, and renting real estate. He is a principal and partner at Bridge Management LLC, managing single-family and small multi-family properties in the Kansas City Metro Area. He is also a principal and partner of Bridge Equity, Kansas City’s premier turnkey real estate provider, flipping 100+ properties a year.

Nathan is a blogger, and writes a weekly blog post for BiggerPockets.com, and has been heard on multiple real estate podcasts and interviews including The BiggerPockets Podcast, Ken Corcini’s podcast Deal Farm, and Eugene Rho’s HomBaBiz, Radio for Small Business show, a weekly broadcast specifically for small business owners on WSBR Money Talk Radio 740am in Boca Raton.

Join us Tuesday Night to learn how Nathan built his team and his business to flip over 100 houses a year.

What to Expect: Doors open at 6 pm. Be sure to check in and get your name tag, find a great seat and save it and then get out there and meet people. Be sure to visit with all the many vendors in the expo hall to find out what services they offer and how they can help you in your business now and into the future. Some of your best resources as an investor are the Vendors at MAREI who know how to structure a deal, who to use for a variety of aspects of the transaction and can help you along the way, with not only their services but their expert knowledge. Be sure to bring business cards and deal flyers for the deal table and bring your questions as we have many experts there every month throughout the room who are more than willing to answer a question.

This meeting is Free for all Investor & Business Members that Pre-Register Below. First Time Guests can also pre-register for their first meeting at no costs. Our Internet Members and all other non-members can pre-register below for $15 or pay $25 at the door. We encourage everyone to pre-register below.
